Asuma delivers two slashes across the opponent's chest and delivers another slash upwards to launch the opponent into the air. Asuma quickly jumps into the air himself, delivers two slashes in the opponent's face and one final slash to send the opponent back into the ground.

[[pl:Rōga Bassui]]
